review_text:
My family would stay in this home again. Overall it is well kept, the neighborhood is nice, and it is very close to the zoo and other attractions. We felt safe in the neighborhood and the off-street parking was nice. The owner communicates well and quickly. Now - I am an overly critical person, but here are the things that I noticed:
1. The main problem was the cleanliness of the floor. It is a very nice LVT floor and was swept well but left a black film on our feet and socks. This isn't the first place I have stayed in with that issue for the floors. These are great floors you just have to pay attention to cleaning in a different way. I messaged the owner and he promptly replied and offered to drop off a Swiffer and cleaning pads that evening and to have the cleaning crew stop by the next morning while we were at the zoo.
2. The mini-split heat system doesn't seem to keep up with even the small size of the residence. The back bedroom and front area stay pretty cold. There is a baseboard heater mounted to the ceiling in the bedroom, but it got the ceiling so hot it made my wife nervous and we turned it off. It didn't really help anyway. Note: it was 29-30 degrees overnight so it was on the chilly side.
3. Be careful with the baseboard heater near the toilet, it gets hot and you could be surprised touching your leg to it when using the restroom.
4. The spiral staircase is really neat. There is some loose hardware that needs attention. The owner mentioned he would attend to it prior to the next tenant.
5. The floor pan in the shower is a little soft and has a crack in it.
6. The ceiling fan has an "Oscillate" switch. Don't switch it on as the fan is zip tied in place.
The washer and dryer are really nice as are the cabinets and other appliances. Paint and drywall was in excellent condition and the kids really enjoyed the loft which has a nice, sturdy, safe railing. The electronic locks were nice and in good shape and as I said the neighborhood and the exterior of the home are in nice shape.
I know the review sounds harsh, but I like to point out things that I would like to know. Overall the place is in nice shape. This air BNB is still better than probably any local hotel room and up there with many other places I have rented. Each place always has quirks and this owner seemed very attentive to needs and making sure things were cleaned/repaired. As I said to him, many times you don't know something is wrong or needing fixed unless/until someone tells you.
Don't be afraid to rent from this owner. We will look this place back up next time we take the kids to the zoo.
